headline: Moderna & Merck Announce 5-Year Data for Intismeran Autogene in Combination With KEYTRUDA(R) (pembrolizumab) Demonstrated Sustained Improvement in the Primary Endpoint of Recurrence-Free Survival in Patients With High-Risk Stage III/IV Melanoma Following Complete Resection
summary: At a median five-year pre-planned follow-up of the Phase 2b KEYNOTE-942/mRNA-4157-P201 study, intismeran autogene in combination with KEYTRUDA reduced the risk of recurrence or death by 49% (HR=0.510; [95% CI, 0.294-0.887]) compared to KEYTRUDA alone ...
